item.title: Support Alternative JSON/Payload
item.description: A few days ago I was dealing with this error: The browser (or proxy) sent a request that this server could not understand. Flask has method called get_json() which help us to retrieve any json data from client, but sometimes get a json data is optional, in case the json is optional we need to pass a value through the get_json function. Example: my_data = request.get_json(silent=True) silent attribute will force the function to fail silently, in case the client is not sending json data , the function will return None as value.
